definition: Shikoku (one of the four main islands of Japan)

sentences.english: Takamatsu is the main hub between Shikoku area and the rest of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 高松是四國與日本其它地區之間的主要樞紐。
四國在莫斯科宣言10月30號。

sentences.english: The four-nation summit meeting on the election in the land base.
sentences.chinese: 此次四國首腦的會議之地就選在這個基地。

sentences.english: Myanmar has a total of 13 main border trade points with its four neighboring countries.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸與其毗鄰四國共有13個主要貿易口岸。

sentences.english: Brazil is the first stop of President Hu Jintao's four-nation tour to Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 巴西是胡錦濤此次拉美四國之行的第一站。

sentences.english: The network three years, are skilled worker get me to enter four countries' easely the palaces.
sentences.chinese: 網絡三年，是師傅悠然領我走進四國的殿堂。

sentences.english: But the BRIC countries don’t even rank in the top 100 on that measure.
sentences.chinese: 不過金磚四國在這一分項中連前100名都沒排進。

sentences.english: The Iyu vine bridge in Shikoku, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 在四國，日本藺生藤的橋樑。

sentences.english: The leaders of Brazil, Russia, India, and China -- a group known as the BRIC countries -- gathered for their first formal summit in the Russian city of Yekaterinburg.
sentences.chinese: “金磚四國”領導人在俄羅斯葉卡捷琳堡峯會上合影。

sentences.english: Indeed, four leaders skipped the summit’s opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，有四國領導人放了鴿子，未出席峯會開幕式。

sentences.english: All these will boost the development of China's relations with the four nations.
sentences.chinese: 這些都將爲中國同四國關係的發展帶來新的推動。

sentences.english: South Korea was the final stop on Obama's four-nation tour of Asia.
sentences.chinese: 南韓是奧巴馬亞洲四國之行的最後一站。

sentences.english: South Korea is the last stop of Mr. Obama's four-nation Asian tour.
sentences.chinese: 韓國是歐巴馬這次四國亞洲之行的最後一站。

sentences.english: The highest point on the island is the Eight Island Temple, which is a famous pilgrimage in the Four Countries.
sentences.chinese: 八島的最高處有八島廟，這是四國著名的朝聖地。

sentences.english: And, in some ways, Brazil outclasses the other BRICs.
sentences.chinese: 在某些方面，巴西要大大超過金磚四國的其他成員。

sentences.english: Shikoku and Kyushu are the other two of the four major islands of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 四國和九州名列日本四大島嶼之中。

definition: Kansai region, Japan/Guanxi or Kuanhsi town in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
